law.catch_line: A retiree may not receive less than the benefits to which the retiree otherwise would be entitled un...

text.section: A retiree may not receive less than the benefits to which the retiree otherwise would be entitled under this Division II.

section.section:
This subsection applies to retirees of:
the Employees' Retirement System;
the State Police Retirement System; or
the Teachers' Retirement System.
A retiree who retired on or before June 30, 1973, may not receive less than the benefits the retiree had received before that date.
